website_summaries.verdict: A very beloved model, you'll find 5-star reviews and excellent satisfaction ratings for this product.
pros: A premium product with the kind of features you find on heavy-duty units costing 4 or 5 times as much
cons: Occasional complaints that assembly and directions are confusing

customer_reviews.title: It's very quiet and otherwise works great but despite the fact that the photo on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very quiet and otherwise works great but despite the fact that the photo on the webpage has a MyQ logo it is not MyQ enabled. You have to buy the hub for that. However you can buy a Chamberlain model that has a bigger motor AND is MyQ enabled for entire $9 more (the hub is $99). I am quite disappointed I bought the wrong one based on the photo but it's already installed. Chamberlain should stop selling models without MyQ built-in.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: description is misleading, it IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH GM HOME LINK WITHOUT A SOLD SEPARATELY COMPATABILITY BRIDGE, why is this not stated? Unit is not compatible with MyQ even though it has the logo clearly marked on the chase why? You have to purchase separately a 99.00 hub for MyQ compatibility. Sorry Chamberlain but that is pure BS... By the time you get the unit home and installed you find out when you actually have is not what your thought you purchased try and return it and you get "PRODUCT INELIGIBLE FOR RETURN" way to go Amazon. May be time to drop this supplier... Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Like it’s battery back up.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly easy to install. Box seemed well packed. I like the parts list and tools list. The “Spring trolley nut” part was hard to understand. Read and vied the video, only after rereading a few times did I see I must remove the “Spring trolley nut” part. I deprogrammed the remotes by pushing the round button, but it was easy to re reprogram them. Like the feature that turns on the lights as to pass the Door entrance. Can open the door remotely from 200 feet away, awesome. Very quiet. Got this because of the battery backup and good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph G

customer_reviews.title: Per Chamberlain, "We do not make the model B730 with MyQ."
customer_reviews.text: All of the pictures of this model sold by this seller on the Amazon website market this as a model B730 that has the MyQ feature onboard. I bought this solely because of the MyQ and when I received the box, realized that the opener doesn't have that feature. I called Chamberlain directly and was told that the B730 does not come with the MyQ option, battery back up and Wifi connectivity. You have to purchase the B970 to get those options Buyer beware. Seller, you need to change your display pictures to accurately portray what you are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Replaced loud chain drive opener.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the 2nd one and it literally did not last 24 hours. Flashing code indicates bad logic board. I have never had an issue with previous Chamberlains so hopefully this is an isolated case. Get to test the customer service. I will update on that later. 1st one I purchased about a week ago works great. ** I did have to change out the light bulbs as some LED bulbs will interfere with the remote control signal.***** UPDATED 8/29.... Received a new logic board very quickly. Pretty easy to install and everything works as it should. Hoping this one lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kraushaar

customer_reviews.title: Chamberlain B730
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a liftmaster model 3265-267 with the chamberlain B730. It installed using the same sensors and wiring. It is much quieter than my other chain drive liftmaster. The cons are the MyQ wifi is not included. The remotes work only with yellow learn button openers and my liftmaster has purple learn button. I do not want two keyless entry pads outside so will have to buy a universal one. I discovered later that the b970 has MyQ wireless but not universal remotes if you have an additional opener.
customer_reviews.author: rodger

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet !
customer_reviews.text: This garage door is so quiet. We didn’t realize how loud our old one was! My favorite feature is the timer...if I leave the door open, it closes after 5 minutes. It took my husband and I about 6 hours to install this. We were replacing a 20 year old opener so we were able to cut corners with the wiring paths and sensors. We’re about a 6/10 on home repair handiness and accomplished this! Also, love the battery back-up. Our power went out the other night and we’re still able to open the door when we arrived home.
customer_reviews.author: AJones

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good looking garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old garage door opener. I had no complaints about my old one, but it died and I needed a new one. I am so impressed with this garage door. It is very quiet, which I love! It also looks nice. I installed it myself with the help of my teenage son. You need help lifting it into place. Not too bad of an install, but it takes a while to take down the old one and install the new one. I replaced the laser sensor eyes and button on the wall, so in all probably 2-3 hours. I really like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: inspector

customer_reviews.title: QUIETEST GARAGE DOOR OPENER I'VE EVER HEARD!
customer_reviews.text: Product came within a day of ordering it, and in perfect condition. Installation was a breeze. Looked it up on UTUBE, found several videos that matched my situation, including one from Chamberlin, which made installation very easy. This ones so quiet, my dog can't detect it opening. Our bedroom is directly above the garage, my old Genie screw pull was so loud, you always knew when the door was opening. Even the floor would shake. Not anymore, quiet as a church mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not really MyQ included - misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.text: like many I got burned with the lack of MyQ (internet access). I studied the models before purchasing, but assumed the logo meant internet access included... no! You still have to buy the $79 gateway separately. Buy instead: B550 (1/2hp) or B970 (1 1/4hp - battery backup) and make sure it has the WiFi logo on it if you want the internet access built in. As with the others this one is quiet, and feels solid, but no internet. This one is 3/4hp and has battery backup, however (I will probably will never need the battery)
customer_reviews.author: LukeDoodle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my third garage door opener, and the best one I've owned. The door opens higher than it ever has and so quiet. I wasn't sure I would like the belt drive, but, it is great. Very easy install. Took me about 4 hours to take the old one down and reinstall the new one. That included running all new wires. If you need a new opener, you really need to check this one out. Even the remotes are ready to go straight out of the package. It also arrived 3 days early.
customer_reviews.author: truckdoctor

customer_reviews.title: 3/4 hp great for double door
customer_reviews.text: super quiet. replaced a terribly noisy genie screw drive. love the soft close feature, motion sensor light and battery backup. Fairly easy to install. Wire length for sensors was too short, had to splice with other wire. Have a 11 foot ceiling, would prefer a design that would allow the sensor wire to run along track, rather than have to attach to the ceiling. Overall , a great opener.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Watching YouTube tutorials in addition to reading the manual may help. We had a problem with tightening the belt, but customer/ technical service was available late on a Saturday and were very knowledgeable and helpful! Highly recommend this product, it works beautifully! Only point that could be improved is the motion detection that turns on the light when you walk from the house into the garage.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a retired contractor so I have experience with garage door openers. The quality is terrific, installation was easy doing it alone, and the units are whisper quiet and work flawlessly. Watch the many good You Tube videos out there for full installation tips. For the people that are commenting on they are slow, I just laugh. They are quicker than my old ones and if 7-8 seconds (not fast enough) for them to fully raise is a deal breaker for some people, I truly feel bad for those people. Buy the units...they are a terrific bargain and tremendous quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This unit is exceptionally quiet.. I'm very pleased with it. I did not get the extra application to be able to control it from my phone. I'm retired so I no longer have to hope my neighbor notices my garage door open while at work. I did have it professionally installed by my garage door people. Took him about 1 1/2 hrs. Great purchase and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sgrif

customer_reviews.title: A high quality garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: The opener arrived when promised, and was well packaged. I installed the opener myself. The instructions were easy to follow and well organized. I had one small problem understanding a programing feature which customer service walked me thru promptly. The opener is so quiet you can barely hear it when in the house. The range of the remote is very impressive. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This opener is the best I've ever seen. It moves the door without making any noise (almost). The reason is that is starts very slowly, then ramps up to a faster speed and before stopping ramps back down to a slower crawl before stopping. The aluminum double door no longer rattles when opened or closed. It's wonderful!! It's a pleasure not to hear all that noise whenever I close the garage door when coming into the house.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: Chamberlain B730. Very Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chamberlain B 730 for use in a residential garage 16x7 ft door. Delivered in two days, I found it easy to put together and easy to install The directions were easy to understand. I do like the way the limit switches adjust both directions. They’re very easy to adjust. What amazed me was how quiet this operator runs, you barely hear it! Now, I’ve had a chain drive before and yes , relatively old. Very pleased with the quietness of this opener. The car controls operate great and from a good distance away! Certainly recommend this opener
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: No Built-in WiFi - Must purchase separately
customer_reviews.text: I have a lower end model of these garage door openers in my condo and thought I'd get one for the house because I loved it so much. Queried 'chamberlain wifi garage door openers' and bought this one. Guess who just blew $70 on a smart myQ hub. Yea - not really happy that I was taken to this page and disappointed in myself for not reading what looked like the same opener I already own. It is what it is. So beware and warned if Amazon sent you here too!
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works quietly and efficiently. Upgraded the garage recently. Initially purchased a different model of same manufacturer as the pictures had the app and wifi operation. Upon receving the unit it was not wifi compatible. This one is. If you want a quiet strong opener that you can control from your phone this is the one. The belt operation is incredibly quiet and the door opens and closes with relative speed. Ive used it from work to open and close the garage to let workers in and it had operated each time with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: laurance kenny

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that this is what you really need, because this Sh*t not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Thong N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Love all the little extras.
customer_reviews.text: Just had a new garage door installed and the company recommended this brand above all others. Paid $206, he said it was a great price for all u get. Works great, very quiet. Love the automatic light in the garage, battery backup, and outdoor keypad. Dont forget to buy the extender if u have an 8ft door.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Saved at least $150 by purchasing this unit on Amazon rather than the garage comp. Purchased Amazon's professional installation but they were unable to find someone to install it. Not sure how easy it is to install because I had a garage door company do it. It works great and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, quiet, quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This is the quietest garage door opener. I only know my garage door is opening or closing if I'm standing inside the garage. No noise can be heard in the bedroom above the garage. The motion sensing light is an added plus. The item arrived quickly. Everything needed to install the door was in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

customer_reviews.title: Went from regular garage door to electric - I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: It's quieter than I expected, and works great. Only thing I'd say is check whether the model you're buying has Wi-Fi enabled or not. Mine didn't, and I didn't realize that so can't control the garage door via phone app. Otherwise it's great. I bought it with the Amazon installation and I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: How to install
customer_reviews.text: You know....generally I don't read instruction manuals! I can usually figure it out! This was rather intimidating at first. BUT......I placed all pieces on a work table and all the tools that I needed for the job on one side of the table as well. It was a little confusing at first but I just went step by step, matched the pix to the proper pieces and as I progressed it got easier and easier. I was quite amazed when it worked for the first time. And so quiet!!!!! That impressed me the most. Well worth the $250.00!! I'm 66 years old; if I could do this (in one day), so could you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jurkowski

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Garage Door Opener I've ever bought and I'm glad I got this one after reading so many reviews on this one and many others. This is a GOOOOD product. It was easy to assemble and install. Just remember to put the one floor sensor away from the sun hitting it as the instructions state. The programming process was really easy. I recommend this one. Read the other reviews and you'll know why. Buy it b/c it works the way you want it, not b/c it's new. I don't need WiFi and all the other gadgets. I bought it for what it is and what I need. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, great price, fast delivery and I'm a happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old chain drive Craftsman that died. I didn't really need the 3/4 hp, but I've got some Tim Allen in me, so I got the higher horsepower just in case. Simple installation and programming. It's only been a couple of weeks, but I love it! The motion sensor is a great feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and quiet, opens beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Excellent opener. Much quieter than the Craftsman it replaced. I can barely hear it from inside the house, and sound in the garage is fairly minimal. Installation was easy. Opens my 16 ft wide door with ease. Adjustments for open and close were simple. Great opener at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase when you want a quiet garage door. We have dogs and our old door made them back every time it opened and closed, now they don't even move because you can barely hear it. We get lots of compliments on this feature as well. The only complaint is that the remote opener is not as sensitive so it takes a few pushes to open and close. Otherwise it is a great buy and we will purchase another when the other doors stop working
customer_reviews.author: rachel backus

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I expected. Amazon installation was amazing! Very impressed on the communication, execution and the end game. Tip your installers. If you're not used to obtaining services, you have no idea what great service is. I appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: not wifi enabled, requires myQ hub for connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: Considering they brand their wifi enabled device as myQ as well, it is very misleading that this product is in fact not wifi enabled. You have to buy the myQ garage hub wifi device which is just a 50 piece of instantly obsolete middle man technology that is connected to nothing else in the IOT universe... Why not just make this opener wifi or smarthings compatible!? Blatant corporate money grab trying to own the "ecosystem" over thinking about customers. Hate it and the hassle of dismantling it and returning it is just too much to bother. I refuse to buy your hub
customer_reviews.author: mr. bee

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. High quality parts and design and runs much quieter than any I've had before. The instructions are very well laid out and easy to follow. Pretty sure my next one will be a Chamberlain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kerth

customer_reviews.title: So quiet if you didn't see it moving you wouldn't know.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet door opener. Very easy to install and adjust. Easy to add extra openers. The only thing I didn't like was that you have to pay for the service to see the door opener on your phone. I elected not to use that service.
customer_reviews.author: jpd43

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about 3 months now, and this works great. This is quiet. Note that this model does not have the wifi option built-in, so you cannot control this from your phone unless you buy the modem separately.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, battery backup won't be used often, but important if the power is out.
customer_reviews.text: This opener is a great improvement over the one we had. The instructions were good. The materials were a couple of bolts/nuts short, but I had them on hand. It is nice and quiet. I like the motion sensor on the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Coorpender

customer_reviews.title: Decent garage door opener, but misleading photo -- NOT wifi enabled
customer_reviews.text: Why does the product photo include "MyQ" when it does not have built in WiFi? This is a decent garage door opener in that it does its job. Would I have ever bought it without that misleading advertising? No I would not have.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver D. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the small print.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this door expecting it to be very easy to use. First, it was for a 7 foot door and I have an 8 foot door. Had to buy a rail extension for $55 at Lowes. Second it was supposed to work with my wifi and smartphone. Nope. I have to buy myQ smart garage door opener for $45. If it wasn't so much work, I would rip it down and send it back to Amazon in a sack. Just be more careful to read the smalllllll print.
customer_reviews.author: Don Henson

customer_reviews.title: Almost silent!
customer_reviews.text: The noise level on this gets an "A+" however, after only a week one of the sensors failed and we are having issues getting intouch with someone who can help on Chamberlain side. Amazon has been a great though. I just want the company to do their part. My husband installed it in about 2, maybe 3 hours. Came with lots of remotes and the code opener, great for when you forget your keys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent opener
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quiet especially compared to our old opener that probably awakened the entire neighborhood when we used it. I have not yet set up the app so that we can open and clean use it with our phones.
customer_reviews.author: iltxok2

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly simple for someone with some mechanical ability. I was replacing an old failed opener so the wiring was already in place for the control and the sensors. Instruction manual is clear with good illustrations. I would recommend this opener to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Sensors are a pain
customer_reviews.text: initially I gave this a better rating and review. But now I am just annoyed with it. The sensors are real stubborn and think something is in the way of the door closing when there clearly is not. Even after re-aligning the sensors, the door won’t close. I’ll have to disengage the door and lower it manually.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Chamberlain garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older model garage door opener because it was noisy. I search and read about this particular model and found one with the back up battery in-case of power outage. I am satisfied with this purchase. We were without electricity for four days and we have minimize the door operation for the battery power to last, it worked for three days on battery power before it quit.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin  andres

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Came in well packed. Very good instructions on how to assemble, you can also go online and watch videos of how to assemble, put it up myself and I am really happy about the range of the remote door openers very quiet, love it
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: May not work with some universal remotes of they are older models.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install although I replaced an existing opener. Very quiet. Could not sync the remote with the car system but it is an older model. Amazon replaced a unit that was previously shipped with missing pieces. The replacement arrived 2 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite, Quite, Quite
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Found out from the installer that Chamberlain makes the 'Craftsman' garage door openers for Sears. This model uses the belt rather than a chain and the difference is night and day on how quite it is. Sometimes have to check to see that it is opening/closing as it is so quite.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: This Opener is Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This opener is fantastic. We cannot hear it in the house at all. The issue installing it was with the wiring. I had to get an installer out to help with the wiring
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, smooth opening, powerful. Came with 3 transmitters, and the keypad transmitter. Bright lights (but cannot use LED bulbs). Replaced an older chain drive Chamberlin and it's like night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good performance and very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced two openers with two new Chamberlin belt driven openers. The old openers sounded like a freight train coming thru and the new ones are so quiet my wife doesn’t even know I’m opening the garage. It’s not difficult to install with the installation instructions but I was a little slow making sure I understood the assembly process. Once programmed it worked flawlessly. I like that the opening and closing distance is adjustable. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good for standard doors. Marginall on 8 foot roller door.
customer_reviews.text: Description said it works for an 8 foot door. Barely brings the door up and even though I double and triple checked the installation angles and offsets it refuses to push the door down properly. I cleaned and aligned the tracks, even greased them. It works fine when disconnected from the drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent opener! Easy to install, extremely quiet. Hopefully it will be durable and long-lasting. Exactly how it was described. I recommend it for either first install or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RCFP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect garage door opener. Bought three 1 was a gift and they love it. Very quite and smooth operation. Wifi interface is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garage door opener and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this garage door opener. So quiet and works well. Had to call the company for an adjustment and they were wonderful and very Helpful. I heartily recommend this chamberlain garage door opener.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy F.

customer_reviews.title: Good garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a similar one for my last house. It is quiet and works well. It has a battery backup and a feature that will close the door automatically if you forget. A really great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M

customer_reviews.title: Best garage door opener!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by this product! Quiet, motion sensor was a great surprise. Contractor (20 year veteran installing garage doors) that installed was impressed too!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Take each step one at a time and follow closely
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to follow directions and easy to install. Only slightly confusing thing was the spring release that keeps tension on the belt. Once installed it needs released and a pair of vice grips works much better vs trying to jamb a screw driver in the slot. NOTE, do not try to loosen on of the nuts on either end. It doesn’t work that way so just do what the instructions say and it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye lifter

customer_reviews.title: Ultra quiet, and easy installation, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Vwry easy to install! This was my first installation, and the instructions werw very well laid out, lots of pictures, and all the hardware is all included. This opener is so quiet, you'll think it's magic! Belt driven, not chain, and easy to sync opener remotes, keypad and other accessories to the unit. You'll be happy with your purchase of this ultra quiet unit, I WAS!
customer_reviews.author: John Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: Great garage door opener. Quiet opener, battery backup, and other great features. Relatively easy to set up with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Book Maze

customer_reviews.title: Needed Battery Back Up feature!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation, replaced a simular opener because we needed the Battery Back Up due to numerous power outages during winter storms here on the Oregon Coast.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: operates smoothly and quietly
customer_reviews.text: The garage door operates very smoothly and quietly. The remote works from a further distance than my previous door opener. It was easy to install and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Flutehappy

customer_reviews.title: This is working great for us!
customer_reviews.text: After 30 years, our old garage door opener went. I'm amazed at how quiet and efficient it is. My husband was able to install it with very limited hassle... hope this lasts like our old one did!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The Chaimberlain B730 was easy to install and ultra quiet. The step by step instructions were simple to follow. I am very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: P. Farrow

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this door opener! Super quiet compared to our older opener, and this one has the battery backup which also works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this a 4 star because I’ve only had it for a few months. It is nice and quiet and is belt driven.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Love the Timer Device
customer_reviews.text: We had this actually almost a year already and it works great. Smooth operation. Love the timer device which closes automatically after selected minutes. Light works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: If you can read you can do this
customer_reviews.text: For what installers wanna charge and how easy it is it's a no brainier I don't like how I have to make an extra purchase for the angle iron for the ceiling or extra trip to Lowe's but I'm happy this is the 2nd 1 I've installed and both have worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: meatcutter

customer_reviews.title: Auto garage opener
customer_reviews.text: ITt has a wonderful, smooth action, and quieter than most. I love the light movement lights.
customer_reviews.author: margaret jones

customer_reviews.title: Belt drive is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a chain drive Liftmaster with this belt drive Chamberlain. Boy, it is quiet! Don't know why I didn't know about these long ago. For anyone who has a bedroom over top the garage, you want this so you don't wake the kids when you pull into the garage. Hoping for many years of trouble free service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can’t recommend this highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Buy this now. I bought this to replace a 1995 1/2 hp craftsman that was failing. The installation was extremely straight forward and this motor is QUIET. I can’t recommend this highly enough. Wow, what a value and improvement in daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Italian

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet. Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Took about 3 hours to install. Very quiet. Smooth. No myQ option ( even though it says it on the unit ). Little pricey, but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Morgan and Joel

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet opener
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet opener. Easy to install and keyless entry pad also a breeze to program No wires to keypad. 4 digit code 👍
customer_reviews.author: mike sobodosh

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quite and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Love this opener. It’s easy to install by one person and whisper quite. Controllers are already programmed. Programing my built in car opener was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: paulj

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in Great shape. Works perfectly ! So quite and smooth ! Would recommend the product and seller, 5 star !
customer_reviews.author: leslie cantu

customer_reviews.title: This is truly quiet and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The best garage door opener. Automatic light and smooth and quiet operation. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Nowotny

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love it...very quiet! powerful! rail a bit too long for my 7’ garage... need to modify the old hanger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Opener!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything. Installs as advertised. Clear assembly directions. More than enough power to lift wood sectional door. Quiet. Easy to program with vehicle (Buick Enclave). Yes, go for it :)
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and simple to program remotes to it. Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but still a flop
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good, can NOT connect to WiFi. Followed instructions from packaging and website but, the blue light will NOT come o. So, I can't connect to WiFi or any other opener. Pretty disappointed, got less than what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Duane reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: NOT MyQ!!
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the picture you will see the "MyQ" logo in the lower right corner. This is incorrect as this unit does not come with this technology. Found this out after the installer had already installed the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy Chase, MD

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. However, requires purchase of options to be cell phone controllable and to connect with Homelink in autos. Very disappointing. These two facts are not obvious when purchasing the opener.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Chamberlain B730
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Had it installed and was blown away... Very quiet, like the covered key pad outside garage door...I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Opener
customer_reviews.text: After installed the unit is much quieter than expected and works soundly..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tafelski

customer_reviews.title: Great Garage Opener!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best garage openers! This is the second one we have. Very quite! Belt drive is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe this is really quite compared to a chain opener. If you have a hot garage, it may not work for you. Ours is under the house, keeps rubber belt cool.
customer_reviews.author: Fede Hall

customer_reviews.title: An excellent upgrade from what was there previously
customer_reviews.text: Quiet! Real quiet! Straight forward install (good/clear instructions). An excellent upgrade from what was there previously.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super opener and easy to set up. I love the quietness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Strong and quiet
customer_reviews.text: quiet, and great. if it holds up, I'll be really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R.

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD i BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought in 1 year (for two different doors). That sums it up!
customer_reviews.author: NITEWATCHER

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that is not clear is that you ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that is not clear is that you have to buy the bridge to connect to the internet separately.
customer_reviews.author: David Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand.  I bought the service plan anyway.  Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Super , super quite. Remotes have good range. I purchased the service plan. Using on a rental property.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, sometimes I have to look at the door to make sure it is opening.
customer_reviews.text: Love the auto-closing feature. No more worries if I left the door open.
customer_reviews.author: GeekStick

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as described It is very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Scan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Best opener I've ever had. Easy to follow instructions, installed in 2 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt Drive Door Opener
customer_reviews.text: My new Chamberlain Group B730 Ultra-Quiet strong belt drive garage door opener is an excellent product and performs as advertised in every way.
customer_reviews.author: sciking

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works well
customer_reviews.text: Put it in a few weeks back and it works great. Nice and quiet and works just as you would expect. Seems like a good value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The quality was nice to have it in store was quick I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The quality was nice to have it in store was quick I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Donzela Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed them yet but reviewed some Youtube videos. Not too complicated but not too easy either. Didn't see any negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gennaro Valenza

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and reliable
customer_reviews.text: We have had people comment how quiet it is and we love the battery backup feature. So glad we got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good opener
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Installation was easy, I was replacing an old unit. Battery back up works great. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Range is okay, better than I had. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quite. I used Amazon professional install service. Had it up and running within 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: MS

product_meta.title: Chamberlain Group B730 Ultra-Quiet and Strong Belt Drive Garage Door Opener with Battery Backup and PLUS Lifting Power, Blue
product_meta.description: The Chamberlain B730 is an ultra quiet and extra strong steel reinforced belt drive garage door opener with anti vibration technology. Perfect for attached garages, it’s precision engineered for years of worry free reliability and smooth performance you can sleep through. Powered by Chamberlain’s Lift Power System, it delivers the highest lifting capacity compared to the ¾ power class. Designed and engineered for safety and security, it features battery backup, enhanced Triband frequency technology for superior range and performance, Security+2.0code encryption, Posi lock protection against forced entry, multi function wall control, wireless keypad and more. Unit accepts two 100 watt max non halogen or 26 watt CFL light bulbs (not included). Designed specifically for 7 ft. garage doors extension kits required for 8 ft. and 10 ft. doors. Lights turn on when entering garage.
feature_bullets: Powered by Chamberlain’s PLUS Lift Power System, the B730 delivers, the highest lifting force equivalent capacity compared to the 3/4 power class for smooth and reliable performance. Motor Power is 3/4 HP
Battery backup ensures safe replacement ins and outs even during power failures.Maximum Open Size 7 feet , Actual rail length is 9.4 feet

Ultra Quiet and Strong Belt Drive Steel reinforced belt drive and constructed with high grade materials for years of reliability and quiet, smooth performance—perfect for attached garages; Open/close your garage door even when the power is out with Battery Backup
Superior Range Includes 2 3 button remote controls that let you control up to 3 openers; Exclusive Triband technology boosts remote range up to 1,500 feet for a quicker entrance and exit
Installation made easy our online installation videos, pre programmed remotes, snap lock rail system and Tech support ensure installation goes smoothly

specifications.Included Components: Safety Sensors, Keyless Entry Keypad, Garage Door Opener, 7 FT Rail Kit, Multi-Function Wall Control, Two 3 Button Remotes Transmitters
specifications.Warranty Description: Motor & Belt: Lifetime; Parts: 5 Years; Accessories: 1 Year
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars308 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
